name: Slime Rancher 2
shortText: Slime Rancher 2 is a wiggly sequel to the award-winning, smash-hit original that has been enjoyed by over 15 million fans worldwide.

name: A Hat in Time: Vanessa's Curse DLC
shortText: Vanessa's Curse is the first official CreatorDLC, and first official online game mode for the indie 3D platformer, A Hat in Time.
